What is the significance of Verus implementing Chain Power and dPoW in terms of its position relative to traditional Proof of Work chains?

The implementation of Chain Power and dPoW in Verus puts Proof of Stake on equal footing with Proof of Work, without sacrificing principles, cost, complexity, or decentralization. This innovation closes the gap between the security of traditional Proof of Work chains and the efficiency of Proof of Stake, making Verus a trailblazer in the blockchain space.
